column2: npix = map.rows * map.cols # should be a square
## parameters used by to compute the varcov matrix
cormod = "stable" # 'stable' correlation model: R(h) = nug + sill*exp(-(h/scale)^shape)
r = .26 # range of spatial autocor (scale parameter)
a = .5 # shape of spatial autocor function (shape parameter)
## list of correlation parameters passed to Covmatrix()
corpars = list(scale = r, power = a, sill = sil, nugget = nug, mean = 0)
